short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to change the background color of ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension to change the theme of ChatGPT
- dark mode/light mode
- design your own input color and  send button icon
ChatGPT 主题插件
-有夜晚护眼/白天两种模式
-自定义你的发送框和发送键

03/26/2024 update

· Optimized the UI of the popup page for improved user experience.
· Fixed a bug where the selected theme state was not retained when reopening the extension.

Thank you for using the ChatGPT Theme Extension! Enjoy the enhanced features and don't hesitate to reach out if you have any feedback or suggestions.

04/11/2024 update
1. New Feature - Custom GPT Avatar Upload:I am excited to introduce the ability for users to personalize their experience by uploading their own GPT avatar! Get creative and make your interface uniquely yours.
2. Performance Improvement - Smooth Sailing: The annoying page lag has been resolved.
